description.zh-cn: 中国演员、歌手、主持人、出品人，毕业于北京电影学院。
description.en: Chinese actor, singer, host, and producer, who graduated from the Beijing Film Academy.

description.zh-cn: 香港模特儿，黄晓明的前妻。
description.en: A Hong Kong model and the ex-wife of Huang Xiaoming.

description.zh-cn: 中国乒乓球运动员，黄晓明的表妹。
description.en: Chinese table tennis player and cousin of Huang Xiaoming.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的电影专业高等院校，黄晓明的母校。
description.en: An institution of higher learning in film studies located in Beijing, China, and the alma mater of Huang Xiaoming.

description.zh-cn: 中国大陆的综合性娱乐集团，黄晓明曾于2007年至2010年签约该公司。
description.en: A comprehensive entertainment group in mainland China, to which Huang Xiaoming was signed from 2007 to 2010.

zh-cn: 东阳易星传媒有限公司

description.zh-cn: 由黄晓明于2010年创办的个人工作室。
description.en: A personal studio founded by Huang Xiaoming in 2010.

description.zh-cn: 一家唱片公司，黄晓明曾于2007年至2010年签约该公司。
description.en: A record company to which Huang Xiaoming was signed from 2007 to 2010.

description.zh-cn: 中国女演员，黄晓明在大学期间的初恋女友。
description.en: Chinese actress, who was Huang Xiaoming's first love during his university years.

description.zh-cn: 中国女演员，黄晓明在大学的同班同学，并于2000年至2004年间交往。
description.en: Chinese actress, a university classmate of Huang Xiaoming, whom he dated from 2000 to 2004.

description.zh-cn: 中国女演员，曾于2003年至2006年与黄晓明交往。
description.en: Chinese actress, who was in a relationship with Huang Xiaoming from 2003 to 2006.

description.zh-cn: 中国女演员，曾于2007年至2010年与黄晓明交往，并曾公开指责Angelababy是第三者。
description.en: Chinese actress, who dated Huang Xiaoming from 2007 to 2010 and publicly accused Angelababy of being a third party.

description.zh-cn: 中国网络红人，曾与黄晓明交往。
description.en: Chinese internet celebrity who was in a relationship with Huang Xiaoming.

description.zh-cn: 中国女演员，曾于2023年与黄晓明传出绯闻。
description.en: Chinese actress, who was rumored to be dating Huang Xiaoming in 2023.

description.zh-cn: 中国演员、导演、制片人，曾与黄晓明并列获得第29届金鸡奖最佳男主角奖。
description.en: Chinese actor, director, and producer, who shared the Best Actor award with Huang Xiaoming at the 29th Golden Rooster Awards.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国山东省的城市，是黄晓明的出生地。
description.en: A city in Shandong Province, China, and the birthplace of Huang Xiaoming.

description.zh-cn: 东亚国家，黄晓明的国籍国。
description.en: A country in East Asia, the nationality of Huang Xiaoming.

description.zh-cn: 东亚的主要民族，黄晓明所属的民族。
description.en: The main ethnic group in East Asia, to which Huang Xiaoming belongs.

description.zh-cn: 联合国下属机构，致力于促进儿童权利和福祉。黄晓明曾担任其爱心大使。
description.en: A United Nations agency dedicated to promoting the rights and well-being of children. Huang Xiaoming served as its Goodwill Ambassador.

description.zh-cn: 黄晓明与Angelababy于2015年5月27日登记结婚，并于2022年1月28日宣布离婚。
description.en: Huang Xiaoming and Angelababy registered their marriage on May 27, 2015, and announced their divorce on January 28, 2022.

description.zh-cn: 黄晓明与Angelababy于2009年9月开始交往，直至2015年5月结婚。
description.en: Huang Xiaoming and Angelababy started dating in September 2009 until their marriage in May 2015.

description.zh-cn: 陈梦是黄晓明的表妹。
description.en: Chen Meng is Huang Xiaoming's cousin.

description.zh-cn: 黄晓明毕业于北京电影学院表演系本科班。
description.en: Huang Xiaoming graduated from the undergraduate program of the Performance Department at Beijing Film Academy.

description.zh-cn: 2007年至2010年，黄晓明签约于华谊兄弟文化经纪公司。
description.en: From 2007 to 2010, Huang Xiaoming was signed with Huayi Brothers Culture Brokerage Company.

description.zh-cn: 2010年，黄晓明离开华谊兄弟后创办了个人工作室。
description.en: In 2010, after leaving Huayi Brothers, Huang Xiaoming founded his own studio.

description.zh-cn: 2007年至2010年，黄晓明的唱片合约属于大国文化集团。
description.en: From 2007 to 2010, Huang Xiaoming's record deal was with Music Icon Group.

description.zh-cn: 李钰是黄晓明在大学期间交往的初恋女友。
description.en: Li Yu was Huang Xiaoming's first love girlfriend during his university years.

description.zh-cn: 2000年至2004年，黄晓明和大学同班同学刘立淇交往并同居。
description.en: From 2000 to 2004, Huang Xiaoming dated and lived with his university classmate Liu Liqi.

description.zh-cn: 黄晓明与秦岚因拍摄《龙票》相恋，于2006年11月分手。
description.en: Huang Xiaoming and Qin Lan fell in love while filming 'Long Piao' and broke up in November 2006.

description.zh-cn: 黄晓明与李菲儿因合作《鹿鼎记》而交往，于2010年分手。
description.en: Huang Xiaoming and Li Fei'er started dating after collaborating on 'The Duke of Mount Deer' and broke up in 2010.

description.zh-cn: 李菲儿曾公开指责Angelababy是介入其与黄晓明恋情的第三者。
description.en: Li Fei'er publicly accused Angelababy of being a third party who interfered in her relationship with Huang Xiaoming.

description.zh-cn: 黄晓明于2024年9月承认与叶珂的恋情，叶珂于2025年8月7日宣布与黄晓明分手。
description.en: Huang Xiaoming admitted his relationship with Ye Ke in September 2024, and Ye Ke announced their breakup on August 7, 2025.

description.zh-cn: 2023年中，黄晓明和赵仕瑾被多次拍到约会。
description.en: In mid-2023, Huang Xiaoming and Zhao Shijin were repeatedly photographed on dates.

description.zh-cn: 2013年，黄晓明与张国立共同获得第29届中国电影金鸡奖最佳男主角奖。
description.en: In 2013, Huang Xiaoming and Zhang Guoli jointly won the Best Actor award at the 29th Golden Rooster Awards.

description.zh-cn: 2009年8月5日，联合国儿童基金会香港委员会委任黄晓明为“联合国儿童基金会香港委员会爱心大使”。
description.en: On August 5, 2009, the Hong Kong Committee for UNICEF appointed Huang Xiaoming as a 'Goodwill Ambassador for the Hong Kong Committee for UNICEF'.
